text: Dale Lynsey Manawa "Chief" McIntosh (born 23 November 1969) is a former rugby union player and current rugby union coach.Dale McIntosh player profile ESPN Scrum.com He was born in Tūrangi New Zealand. ==Notes== ==External links== *Dale McIntosh profile on Ponty.net Category:Welsh rugby union players Category:New Zealand rugby union players Category:Wales international rugby union players Category:Pontypridd RFC players Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Rugby union flankers Category:Rugby union number eights Category:Rugby union locks Category:New Zealand expatriate sportspeople in Wales
title: Dale McIntosh
